response.overview: A compilation of 20 Hammer theatrical trailers, among them The Abominable Snowman Of The Himalayas, X The Unknown, Dracula - Prince of Darkness, The Reptile, The Vengeance Of She, Frankenstein Created Woman, Plague Of The Zombies, The Viking Queen, The Lost Continent, A Challenge For Robin Hood, The Satanic Rites Of Dracula, and Shatter. Originally a bonus disc given away with Anchor Bay's Blood From The Mummy's Tomb.
response.title: The Hammer Trailer Collection
